Player History
Had first career hit on 3/31/2013, off Jhoulys Chacin (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/2013, off Jacob Turner (MIA)...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Houston on 7/5/2013...
Injured on 7/26/2013 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
8/10/2016: Signed a contract extension with Arizona, $1,430,000 per year, for 2 years.
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 7/14/2017...
Won World Series with Arizona in 2017...
Traded from Arizona to Miami on 7/30/2018 (Going to MIA: 2B Martin Prado, P Marvin Montiel. Going to ARI: P Hubert Guyette)...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/26/2019 to a 3-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Released by Houston on 4/1/2021...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 5/31/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $516,000 per year...
Injured on 8/24/2021 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 9 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/17/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $2,700,000 per year...
Drafted in 9th round, 258th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2023...
